story.text: NEW YORK Jan 2 Aflac Inc. (AFL.N) said on Tuesday it had promoted Paul Amos II, a member of the founding family, to president of the disability insurer. Amos will continue in his role as chief operating officer of Aflac U.S. and focus on Aflac's U.S. operations. Aflac operates both in Japan, where it has the bulk of its sales, and in the United States.
story.title: aflac promotes paul amos ii to president
